article: japanese electronics giant toshiba said tuesday it has helped develop a next-generation memory chip with uses from home appliances to mobile telephones , two weeks after its south korean rival samsung started mass production of unk chips .
abstract: toshiba in rivalry with samsung unveils own next-generation chip
